DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect patupilone pharmacokinetics warfarin patient advanced malignancy .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Effects Patupilone Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Warfarin Patients With Advanced Malignancies
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Age ≥ 18 year age Life expectancy ≥3 month Histologically document advanced solid tumor progress standard systemic therapy standard systemic therapy exist Agents contain warfarin heparin must discontinue 7 day prior enrollment study Exclusion criterion History of/or active bleeding disorder Known hypersensitivity warfarin relate compound The use vitamin K Central line require anticoagulant maintenance The use agent contain warfarin heparin Known diagnosis human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection , hepatitis Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
